Log: + Camera Settings for live stream (WB, Exposure, Focus) + QR Code local sharing (Mobile Hotspot and Manual network settings) + Color correction for photo + Improved photo capture + Mirror liveview on\off toogle in booth screens menu + Sharing screen improved (New Stylish Icons) + Printer \ Camera \ Network lists are refreshing on background (no need to refresh manually) + Fix open printer settings window + Update check on startup and in preferences menu + Improved stability + Fix some freaky bugs
